data.title: Team Bondi News - Push Square
data.text: News Here's Your First Look at Whore of the Orient, the Next Game by Team Bondi Paris of the East Team Bondi doesn’t do straight-forward. The Australian developer behind detective title L.A. Noire was unceremoniously dumped by Rockstar upon completion of the PlayStation 3 game. It was then supposedly snapped up by Sydney-based production house KMM, where it started work on a PlayStation 4 project named Whore of the Orient... KMM Team Bondi PS4 Leaks News L.A. Noire Interrogates The PlayStation Network This Week If you haven't got around to sampling L A. Noire's outrageously nifty interrogation mechanics yet, then things are about to get a whole lot easier. Detailed in the PlayStation Blog's weekly "The Drop", Sony's announced that Rockstar has a digital version of the crime thriller in the pipeline. It's set to release when the... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire Creator Working On Whore Of The Orient The man responsible for L A. Noire, Brendan McNamara, is to have his next project produced by Kennedy Miller Mitchell. The game, according to a report published by the Financial Review, is entitled Whore Of The Orient — another name for the city of Shanghai. Much of Team Bondi, the studio responsible for L.A. Noire, got folded into KMM... PlayStation 3 LA Noire Team Bondi Kennedy Miller Mitchell Kmm Interactive News L.A. Noire: Complete Edition Cofirmed For PlayStation 3 If you didn't get a chance to dive into L A. Noire yet, Rockstar's confirmed that the game's Complete Edition is coming to PlayStation 3 on November 15th and November 18th in North America and Europe respectively. The Complete Edition comes with the main campaign (obviously) as well as all the pre-order gubbins and DLC. It means you'll be... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Team Bondi Owed Lots Of Money To Lots Of People L A. Noire developer Team Bondi owed debts to the tune of AU$1,425,156 ($1.4 million USD / £900k) before it was closed. EDGE reports that more than a million dollars were owed to staff, with executives claiming up to $100k a pop. Unbelievably, Team Bondi closed owing $150k to Depth Analysis, the company that created the MotionScan facial... PlayStation 3 Industry Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire Developer Team Bondi Is No More What an extraordinary story L.A. Noire developer Team Bondi was subject to enormous critical acclaim before getting hit by an employment scandal. And now it is no more. The studio entered administration in late August, with its assets supposedly sold to Australian production company Kennedy Miller Mitchell. Despite critical and commercial success, a... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi Rumour L.A. Noire Game Of The Year Edition Coming November? A number of European video game retailers are listing the release of a Game Of The Year edition for L A. Noire, due for release this November. And yes, you'd be right for pointing out that L.A. Noire has yet to win any Game Of The Year awards — largely because the game only released in May of this year. Still, the package promises to... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games La Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire Developer Sells Assets To KMM According to a Develop source, the rumours regarding Team Bondi are true: the company and its assets have been sold off to KMM Productions, the company owned by Mad Max creator George Miller According to Develop, all Team Bondi staff have received a letter offering them a job at KMM or a severance package. It's unknown whether Team Bondi will... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games La Noire Team Bondi Rumour Team Bondi Bankrupt, Folded Into KMM According to reports on NeoGAF, L A. Noire developer Team Bondi has gone bankrupt, and is being folded into KMM Studios — the animation outfit currently working on Happy Feet 2. The news follows a series of rumours about the developer's fate. Apparently Depth Analysis, the company Team Bondi formed in order to create L.A. Noire's... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Team Bondi Blames Blu-ray Space Limitations On Cut L.A. Noire Content Team Bondi's Brendan McNamara has revealed that content was cut from L A. Noire due to the limitations of using a single Blu-ray disc — even though L.A. Noire does not use the maximum capacity Blu-ray available. According to McNamara, two desks known as bunko and burglary were written, designed and had art assets created — despite... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News June NPD: Patrick Seybold You Sly Dog, You Turns out Patrick Seybold was very crafty with his wording of inFamous 2's sales success While Sucker Punch's super-hero adventure might have been the top selling single SKU in June, it did not manage to outsell its multiplatform rivals L.A. Noire and Duke Nukem Forever. But that's ok, we'll forgive it that. Finishing up in third on the... PlayStation 3 PlayStation 2 PlayStation Portable Sales Rockstar Games News Let's Take A Look At L.A. Noire's Final DLC Case We assumed Rockstar and Team Bondi would continue to release L A. Noire DLC for as long as the market demanded it, but we suppose this content is expensive to make. As such, Reefer Madness is being touted as the final case in the detective game's post-release collection. The Vice case sees Phelps paired up with Earle, attempting to uncover... PlayStation 3 Trailers Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi Report Rockstar Won't Publish Team Bondi's Next Title It's funny what goes on behind closed doors While the relationship between Rockstar and Team Bondi seemed water-tight during the public build-up for L.A. Noire, it's capitulated ever since. Talk of long hours, poor management and "disdain" between the developer and publisher have surfaced over the past few weeks — prompting a report from... PlayStation 3 Industry Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News PushSquare Service Announcement: L.A. Noire's 'Nicholson Electroplating' DLC Is Out Today Heads up detectives: Rockstar's just sent us word that L A. Noire's "Nicholson Electroplating" DLC is out today on the PlayStation Network. If you've already purchased an L.A. Noire season pass it will cost you the grand total of $0.00. The best price. Those of you without a season pass will need to cough up $3.99. Still not a... PlayStation 3 PlayStation Network Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar Releases Debut Trailer For L.A. Noire's 'Nicholson Electroplating' DLC Rockstar's released a trailer and new details about L A. Noire's latest DLC pack. There's been an explosion at the Nicholson Electroplating plant and its down to Phelps and his arson desk partner Biggs to solve the case. At 9.45 in the morning, a thunderous explosion rocks Los Angeles," explains Rockstar. "City blocks are... PlayStation 3 PlayStation Network Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar Pass Video Tries To Make Sense Of L.A. Noire's Bemusing DLC Plan If you buy the Rockstar Pass for L A. Noire you're essentially able to pre-order all of the game's seven DLC packs for a one-off price ($10) that's roughly 50% cheaper than it would be if you bought all of the content separately. Or something. Seeing as the whole concept is all a little bit bemusing, Rockstar's released the above trailer... PlayStation 3 PlayStation Network Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar Announces Pass For L.A. Noire, A Nifty Method Of Keeping Used Copies Off The Shelves Rockstar's announced its "Pass" service for L A. Noire this afternoon, a nifty method of keeping the primarily single-player title out of used game stores. The service will essentially allow players to "pre-purchase" all of L.A. Noire's upcoming DLC for $10. The content will still be available a la carte, but will cost you 50%... PlayStation 3 PlayStation Network Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News UK Sales Charts: DiRT 3 Unable To Overtake L.A. Noire L A. Noire has held onto the UK sales charts top spot for a second week running, beating off Codemasters' semi-sim DiRT 3 which finished up in a respectable second. LEGO Pirates Of the Caribbean, Zumba Fitness and Brink all held onto their high positions to round out the top five, with familiar faces such as Crysis 2 and Call Of Duty:... PlayStation 3 PlayStation 2 PlayStation Portable Sales Rockstar Games News Expect L.A. Noire DLC News On Your Desk Next Week Rockstar's confirmed that details of L A. Noire's DLC plans will be revealed next week. The company announced the, errr, announcement in a Tweet overnight. There are already two additional L.A. Noire cases made available through various retail chains: The Naked City and A Slip Of A Tongue. Details on a third DLC pack, Nichlson... PlayStation 3 PlayStation Network Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News UK Sales Charts: L.A. Noire Takes Top-Spot, Becomes Fastest Selling New IP Of All Time Team Bondi's crime-thriller, L A. Noire, has literally flown out of the gates, becoming the fastest-selling new IP of all time in the UK. The game — which knocked Brink from its perch atop the charts — outsold Rockstar's previous effort, Red Dead Redemption, by some margin to claim the accolade. The UK chart is actually a pretty... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Analyst Expects L.A. Noire To Sell 3-4 Million Copies, We Reckon It'll Go Higher Arvind Bhatia of analyst firm Sterne Agee reckons L A. Noire will sell 3-4 million copies. Based on the critical and consumer reaction, we wouldn't be surprised if the game doubled that estimate over the course of its life-span. We think the Street is expecting the title to sell 3 to 4 million units and so far the initial reviews seem... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire's 'Nicholson Electroplating' Arson Case Due Out On June 21st As part of a promotion with Best Buy, Rockstar awarded the first sixteen purchasers of L A. Noire with a free redeem code for the game's first batch of DLC. The pack, entitled the "Nicholson Electroplating" Arson Case, will be available next month according to the redeem code's instruction page, which slaps a June 21st release... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire Pushes Take-Two Shares Through The Roof L A. Noire is not yet out in the UK. The crime-thriller released overnight in North America. Even though it's early days, the unique Rockstar published title has already made a killing for Take-Two. A round of positive reviews pushed Take-Two's shares up by 7.75 per cent to $17.10, a 32-month high for the company. We wonder if Sony regrets... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire Reviews Make The Wait For Release Even Tougher Let's be honest: most people have already decided whether they're going to buy L A. Noire by now. There's no need for reviews at this point. Still, L.A. Noire is a video game, and naturally publications will review the game. So what's the consensus? It's good, really good. GiantBomb's Brad Shoemaker scored it a 5/5, explaining that... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News PlayStation 3 The Lead Platform For L.A. Noire, Says Team Bondi Team Bondi has confirmed that the PlayStation 3 was the lead development platform for upcoming crime thriller L A. Noire. It's not much of a surprise, given that the game was originally intended to be a PS3 exclusive. "For this project, we led on PlayStation 3, and in a way I think that's what most people are doing," Team Bondi... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games La Noire Team Bondi News Just One More Week: L.A. Noire's Launch Trailer Gets Us Hot Under The Collar Yo, we don't know if you've heard but there's a game coming out next week -- a really good one At least, we hope so anyway. Everything we've seen of Rockstar and Team Bondi's crime-thriller, L.A. Noire,borders on the positive side of brilliant. After awarding our game of the year award to Rockstar and Red Dead Redemption last year, we're waiting to... PlayStation 3 Trailers Rockstar LA Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar Announces Duo Of L.A. Noire Soundtracks L A. Noire is out next week. We're so excited that we're literally doing handstands in the middle of a motorway wearing period appropriate clothing. Not really of course, that would be dangerous. And stupid. Seriously, don't try that at home. Rockstar being Rockstar, our inbox is still being flooded with new announcements regarding the... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar Outlines Social Club Features In L.A. Noire Rockstar's Social Club is a great extension to games with a lot of content You'll recall Red Dead Redemption allowing you to follow your progress online via the web portal. L.A. Noire will boast the very same feature, allowing you to track every last morsel of action that it will take to reach the coveted 100% completion mark, as well as... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar To Digitally Release Selection Of L.A. Noire Short Stories Rockstar has confirmed that it has partnered up with Mulholland Books to release a digital collection of short stories called L A. Nore: The Collected Stories. Some of the short stories will focus on the characters and cases from the Team Bondi developed L.A. Noire video game. Authors being touted include Megan Abbott, Lawrence Block, Joe Lansdale,... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games La Noire Team Bondi News Latest L.A. Noire Gameplay Trailer Gets, Well, Gamey Everything we've seen of L A. Noire thus far has focused on the game's incredibly realistic facial animation. So it's jarring to see some of the more "gamey" elements revealed in this latest trailer. Intuition points, scores and experience points? It sounds like a video game, but it's not quite what we expected from L.A. Noire,... PlayStation 3 Trailers Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar Confirms PS3 Exclusive L.A. Noire Content, Details On The Way Rockstar has confirmed that L A. Noire will receive exclusive content in the PlayStation 3 version of the game. We reported this morning that retailers had updated their boxart for the PS3 version of the game, hinting at exclusive features. Later evidence suggested that PS3 owners would get an additional mission called the "Consuls... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi Rumour L.A. Noire Nets Exclusive Content On PlayStation 3 A bunch of leading North American retailers have updated their boxart for the PlayStation 3 version of L A. Noire, revealing an "Exclusive Features" tag at the top of the packaging. Further investigation around the 'Net points to an exclusive mission for PS3 called the "Consul's Car Traffic Case". Expect an announcement... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games La Noire Team Bondi News Rockstar Promises You Won't Have To Wait Long For L.A. Noire's Preorder Bonuses Rockstar's only just getting round to releasing Red Dead Redemption's pre-order bonuses on the PlayStation Store The publisher cites "technical reasons" for the delay. In the case of the RDR, the delay isn't actually such a big deal. The game's pre-order bonuses were pretty low key — adding in golden guns, additional costumes and a new... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games La Noire Team Bondi News Is There Anything Left For Us To Say About L.A. Noire? Good grief, Rockstar's pulled it off again Sure, we actually need to play L.A. Noire before we go out spewing too much hyperbole, but we can't think of a single game due out this year (including Uncharted 3) that looks as promising as this. Bloody nora. PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Check Out L.A. Noire's 'A Slip Of The Tongue' Bonus Case L A. Noire continues to toe game of the year territory with this short teaser trailer for its "A Slip Of The Tongue" bonus case. The mission is available alongside pre-orders of the game from Walmart in North America and Play.com in the UK. Rockstar previously confirmed that all of its preorder bonus missions will be available as... PlayStation 3 Trailers Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News There'll Be No Collector's Edition For L.A. Noire, Confirms Rockstar Rockstar's confirmed that there will be no collector's edition for L A. Noire when the game releases in May. It's a semi-refreshing change for an industry that demands any remotely popular game franchise must have a special edition. Of course, it's not a first for Rockstar — Red Dead Redemption also launched without a special edition... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi Collectors Editions News There's Definitely Still A Touch Of Uncanny Valley To L.A. Noire L A. Noire screenshots are pretty hit or miss. While the game looks absolutely amazing in motion, the still shots can look a bit... Odd. It's, of course, the faces. They look like they've been stuck on with a Pritt-Stick. It reminds us of Goldeneye 64. Remember how the guards had a photographs for faces? Yeah, that was weird. PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire's Campaign Is Roughly 25 Hours In Length Hopefully nobody will be moaning about the length of L A. Noire's single-player campaign, as a report on PlayStation Lifestyle pitches the experience at about 25 hours in length. Apparently that time-span relates purely to the main campaign, and not side-missions and cases that help to flesh out the secondary characters. PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Ok L.A. Noire... We All Know You Look Amazing, You Can Stop Teasing Now! Another year, another Rockstar game, another potential game of the year The PR cycle is now in full-flow for L.A. Noire. Everytime a new trailer pops into our inbox we can't help but wish that May release date would come sooner. It kinda reminds us of last year, when Rockstar employed the exact same strategy for Red Dead Redemption. We all remember... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Confirmed: L.A. Noire Still (STILL!) Looks Amazing Argh The music. The visuals. The animation. The premise. Everything about Rockstar's L.A. Noire looks so darn good. The latest trailer details one of the game's additional missions, available with pre-orders from GAME in the UK and GameStop in the US. Sure it looks pretty macabre — we're not sure we could hack this detective lark — but, man, it... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News Ok, Now We're Excited For Rockstar's L.A. Noire We've been a little harsh on L A. Noire lately. The focus on the game's technology has really taken us away from the core of what's been developed here, and for that we apologise. The latest trailer for L.A. Noire has reminded us that behind Team Bondi's facial animation technology, there's actually going to be a video game. And it's... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire Confirmed For May 20th Release In Europe Rockstar's just slapped a big official release date stick on L A. Noire with the words "May 20th" clearly marked down in red Sharpie. A leaked trailer confirmed a May 17th release date for North America over the weekend. All makes sense now, eh? There's a new trailer due this afternoon. L.A. Noire breaks new ground for us,... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News These L.A. Noire Screenshots Are All About People's Faces We're beginning to wonder if there's anything else to L A. Noire other than "OMGZ LOOK HOW GOOD THE FACES ARE WITH OUR MOTIONSCAN TECHNOLOGY!" Every single screenshot, trailer and piece of PR has focused on the same thing. The faces. Look at the goddamn faces. Y'know guys, we think Rockstar want us to look at the faces. As it... PlayStation 3 Screens Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News L.A. Noire Sports Over 50 Hours Of Dialogue... 50 Hours! Team Bondi's Brendan McNamara has lofted that L A. Noire sports over 50 hours of dialogue: We captured over 50 hours worth of dialogue in total, all using MotionScan  its equivalent to about two full seasons of a TV show, he told IGN. Each case has its own twists and turns depending on the choices you make, leading you down... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News There's More Than A Hint Of Uncanny Valley In This L.A. Noire Trailer Look, the tech behind L A. Noire is clearly absolutely phenomenal. We get that. At the same time, the game just looks weird. Because the technology is so amazing and the facial capture is so realistic, the crappy looking character models just make everything look weird. We hope the rough edges are just a result of early development or... PlayStation 3 Trailers Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News New L.A. Noire Trailer Is Good, Fine, Serviceable, Alright, Two-Squares, Whatever We hopped onto Twitter shortly after the embargo for L A. Noire's latest trailer lifted and couldn't really fathom the trend of, "OMFG L.A. NOIRE IS TEH BEST THINGZ EVER," that filled our stream. It looks good, for sure. The tone's neat and the facial animation is incredible. Outside of that we're not quite sure what... PlayStation 3 Trailers Rockstar Games LA Noire Team Bondi News New LA Noire Trailer Pledged For This Thursday Rockstar's sent us a word of notification that LA Noire's set to get a brand new trailer this Thursday It'll be the first trailer for the game in four years. The trailer's expected to go live around 5PM here in the UK, that's roughly 12PM EST. The crime thriller's often been described in the same sentence as "ground breaking". Guess we'll... PlayStation 3 Rockstar Games La Noire Team Bondi
